name: Garden (Aviv)
description:
(Note: This game was made for the fourth Nokia 3310 Jam)

A simple gardening/farming simulator! Grow some plants, peacefully, in your own personal garden.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move
1 - Select Seeds - For planting new seeds
2 - Select Watering Can - For watering old seeds
3 - Select Trowel - For clearing space
Space - Use tool where you are standing.

You can fill up your watering can at the well. Don't forget to sleep!

(Developer's Note: This game was released in a hurry, so builds may be faulty or unreliable.)

Attributions:

m3x6 Font - Daniel Linssen
Futile Pro - Eeve Somepx
